data.actual_result: The timer resets and starts from the starting.
data.expected_result: The timer continues from the place it was before switching orientation.
data.short_description: Switching orientation causes the "Connection problems?" in app notification's timer to reset.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get the "Connection problems?" in app notification (idk. Just get it somehow). - Let the timer move a bit and switch orientation.
